name: A New Season - Galavant
description:
Have you ever dearly hoped that if you sent enough fan mail or made enough tweets, you could just continue a show indefinitely?

In this funny little arcade game, keep Galavant alive by sending Tweets and Fan Mail to the network!

Created in one day for the Galavant Jam! 

Music Transcribed from MuseScore from the Youtube Videos by myself.

Art also by myself.

Programming was done in Game Maker Studio 2.

*If you liked it or want to give some feedback, remember to leave a comment!
